metadata.name: Car crash game #1/33
metadata.description:
CAR CRASH GAME

In the Circus Republic, even tragedies are turned into play. 

Car Crash Game thus becomes the playful representation of an improbable theatrical performance, where even a head-on collision between two cars manages to take on grotesque and amusing tones.

A freak show that draws from the goliardic spirit of old circuses like Barnum's, where even the human oddities generated by the whims of nature - which in my case I randomly generated thanks to the whims of the AI - such as the 3 Legged Man Jonathan Redaviv, the hypertrichotic Lion Man or the Lilliputian General Tom Thumb, in the Circus Republic would have been elevated to national heroes.
